title: The GIL (Global Interpreter Lock)
shortDescription: Python's GIL allows only one thread to execute Python code at a time!
detailedDescription: The Global Interpreter Lock is a mutex that protects access to Python objects, preventing multiple native threads from executing Python bytecodes simultaneously. While this can limit multi-threaded performance, it simplifies memory management and makes Python more stable.
